item.title: 2021.06.30 patch notes (v108.01) | TERA KR
item.description: Update 1. Dungeon Added new dungeon : Core Reactor (pl.) (5-Person instance) Core Reactor (pl.) Entry limit None Adventure Coin 280 Entry level 70 Matching item level 504 Completion reward Option lock material, Option Boost Scroll, Mahtnan gear box (pl.), Mahtnan gear (pl.) enchanting material, Kaia’s Belt, Etching material, Superior Halidom / Relic, Card Fragment Entry method Teleportal is located at Verrak Fortress, with access via Dungeon Teleportal Scroll sold from Exodor Specialty Store, Vanguard Request dungeon entrance teleport, or through Instance Matching Added remake instance : Encroached Damned Citadel (pl.

item.title: v108 : Mahtnan Gear (pl.)
item.description: Mahtnan gear (pl.) is the new gear set added v108, as part of a new season of TERA, namedly TERA : AWAKE. Mahtnan gear (pl.) differentiates itself from the previous Kaia’s Soul gear set by removing damage on enchant, and Infusion options. This makes it one of the easiest gear set to enchant due to the removal of artificial enchanting difficulty, but other factors have been added to make Mahtnan gear (pl.
